Project Shortlink Service Сlc.li is a comprehensive tool that offers a variety of features for quick link shortening, making it easier for users to manage and track their links efficiently. Here are some of the key features:

Bookmark-Shortener:
Instantly shorten any website you are currently viewing.
If logged in, shortened links are automatically saved to your account.

Browser Extensions:
Available for Google Chrome, Opera, Yandex, and Microsoft Edge browsers.
Facilitates quick and easy link shortening directly from the browser.
Shortened links can be automatically saved to the user's account.

Telegram Bot:
A Telegram Bot that shortens links with a simple URL submission.
Fast and convenient link shortening directly within the Telegram platform.

Marketing Capabilities:
Recognizes short links as a powerful marketing tool.
Collects valuable data about customers and their behaviors through short links.

Link Types:
Intuitive and trackable short links.
Customizable and secure QR codes.
Simple yet beautiful Bio Pages for links.

Productivity Tools:
Custom Landing Page creation for promoting products or services.
CTA Overlays for unobtrusive notifications, polls, or contact forms on target websites.
Event Tracking with the ability to add custom pixels from providers like Facebook.

Targeting and Tracking:
Smart Targeting allows restrictions on links based on specific countries, languages, or devices.
Advanced reporting tool for tracking user data, including city and country information.
Team Management with specific privileges for collaboration.

Branded Domain Names:
Users can add their own domain name for short links, enhancing brand control and user trust.

Campaigns and Channels:
Group and organize links, Bio Pages, and QR codes into campaigns.
Aggregated statistics available for campaigns.

Developer API:
A powerful API for building custom applications or extending existing applications.

Track and Optimize:
In-depth tracking capabilities, including clicks, country, and referrer data.
Optimization tools to understand user behavior and increase conversion rates.

Team Collaboration:
Invite team members and assign specific privileges for efficient collaboration.

Integrations:
Connect links to third-party applications for sharing traffic and analytics data.

Tracking Pixels and Notifications:
Add custom pixels from providers like Facebook and Google Tag Manager.
Receive notifications through channels such as Slack and webhook services like Zapier.

Project Shortlink Service Сlc.li aims to provide a one-stop solution for link management, offering a range of features to cater to individual users, teams, and marketers alike.
